reviewText: received it in time for a large group party.....Great evening of enjoyment.
If you're looking for entertaining comedy fun for the whole family David Pendleton one that fits the bill.  Great entertainer.

This is definitely one of my best DVD purchases in recent memory.  David Pendleton is one amazing performer.  His ability as a ventriloquist, comedian, and Christian entertainer will amaze you.  My kids and grandkids have loved it!
